document_data.mainbody:
The prisoners manacles were a pair of disconnected manacles found in the Wheloon Prison in the mid-1480s DR.
The manacles gave the wearer a certain brutal strength and power, especially when striking with their weighted fists directly.
The prisoners manacles were found by Cormyrean forces that overcame Rantha, the gatekeeper officer of General Marthir. This was part of a greater counterattack at the Netherese Recruiting Center inside the Wheloon Prison, where prisoners were taken in and turned into soldiers for Thultanthars army.
